entities.description: The time frame of the past 30 days, including today's date.
Number of whole days missed from school due to sickness or injury.
The reason for missing school, specifically due to being sick or injured.
Number of days missed due to staying home with a sick child or family member.
The month during which the respondent last smoked part or all of a cigar or cigarillo.
The age at which the respondent last drank an alcoholic beverage.
The year during which the respondent last drank an alcoholic beverage.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 30 days.
Indicates the number of days the respondent missed school due to sickness or injury.
Defines the reason for the school absence, such as being sick or injured.
Indicates the number of days the respondent missed school due to caring for a sick child or family member.
Indicates the month during which the respondent last smoked part or all of a cigar or cigarillo.
Specifies the age at which the respondent last drank an alcoholic beverage.
Specifies the year during which the respondent last drank an alcoholic beverage.
